title: Celebrity Gossip Part 1 - How To Say Adele
description: Matthew Perry said something that got a lot of people’s attention… but now he’s got a different version that might change how you interpret what he said. And there is a very famous singer who wrote and performs the songs “Someone Like You” and “Set Fire To The Rain.” Have we been saying her name wrong?
itunes:author: YEA Networks
